com.spotify.flo

Class Task<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.spotify.flo.Task<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - A type carrying the execution metadata of this task
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public abstract class Task<T>
extends Object
implements Serializable
    A task is some work that has to be done, once a list of input tasks have completed. Tasks are constructed using a TaskBuilder, use named(String, Object...) as the starting point.

    Tasks can not be directly evaluated. Instead, a EvalContext has to be used. The context will determine further details about the evaluation (threading, memoization, instrumentation, etc.). See EvalContext.evaluate(Task).

    See Also:
